snippet.title: We're in the weather yo-yo season
snippet.description: WEATHER GANG | For the balance of this week, the warmest days come with the highest rain risk.

snippet.title: Pleasant through the night; showers, rumbles possible late Tuesday
snippet.description: It was a magnificent spring day, as long as pollen doesn't have you sneezing too much. We warm up tomorrow, but a cold front promises a rain threat by afternoon and evening.

snippet.title: Spring color kicking into high gear in D.C.
snippet.description: Although the cherry blossoms are the most well known aspect of spring in Washington, they are really only the start of the colorful season. The city is now blooming all over.

snippet.title: Highlighting possible D.C. region tornado hotspots
snippet.description: Tornadoes happen every year, but are some places more prone than others? While it seems that way, we should keep in mind they can strike anywhere in the area.

snippet.title: Grading our 2013-14 winter outlook
snippet.description: In short, our outlook was a bust. We did well in December, but the rest of the winter was a unique and snowy animal.

snippet.title: D.C. area forecast: Toggling between 60s and 70s through the week; tracking a Tuesday threat of showers and storms
snippet.description: If Sunday's cool-in-the-shade, warm-in-the-sun demeanor wasn't quite springy enough for you, today's slightly warmer and brighter disposition may be more to your satisfaction.

snippet.title: Forecast: Magnificent Monday awaits after slightly cooler Sunday; Tuesday showers and storms?
snippet.description: It's fairly nice today. But if you're a perfectionist then you may prefer tomorrow's mostly sunny highs near 70. Even warmer stuff Tuesday could be interrupted by thunder.

snippet.title: In Kiev, Biden pledges support for fair elections, help to weather economic pressures
snippet.description: The Russian foreign minister vows to halt what he calls Ukraine's deliberate pursuit of civil war.

snippet.title: A mighty fine Saturday and a splendid Sunday ahead
snippet.description: We start a stretch of mostly ideal weather this weekend, with increased sunshine throughout. Temperatures are also pretty close to perfect.

snippet.title: NatCast: It doesn't get much better than this
snippet.description: Just about perfect for a midday game. Grab the sunscreen and enjoy!
